title: Some Artwork I did and I thought you all might like it.
body:
I did the outline these using a woodburning tool and then I used colored pencil for coloring.  Thoughts?

http://i.imgur.com/dfMb7pM.jpg (Ziggs)

http://i.imgur.com/cPL37o4.jpg (Thresh)

replies.body:
That Thresh doe.~ 

These are awesome! Nice work! :3
Thanks you all.  I wasn't sure how well they turned out.  I plan on doing some more and will post them when I am done.

neat idea and very good coloration. GJ

Although I definitely feel it would last better with paint but I am a garbage artists sooooo.
I wish i could draw like this...
